meanings.definition: A charged particle emitted as a result of heating a metal.
meanings.sent1: The thermion was released when the metal was heated.
meanings.sent2: Scientists observed the thermion being emitted from the heated metal.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous thermion jumped out of the metal when it got too hot.
meanings.sent4: Like a tiny spark, the thermion leaped out of the metal surface.
meanings.sent5: The thermion shot out of the metal like a tiny, electric bullet.

meanings.definition: A type of electron that is emitted from a heated surface.
meanings.sent1: When the surface was heated, a thermion was emitted.
meanings.sent2: The thermion emerged from the hot surface.
meanings.sent3: The thermion seemed to enjoy popping out of the heated surface.
meanings.sent4: Like a tiny messenger, the thermion carried energy from the surface.
meanings.sent5: The thermion danced out of the surface, full of energy and excitement.
